body:
It would be nice to have the ability to remove all implicit packages that are not needed anymore since the explicit package that requested them is already uninstalled

### Rationale

This would be really helpful to keep the list of installed packages tidy and save memory space

### Description

I could image extending the `spack clean` command to support such an action.
But also introducing a new command like `spack reclaim` (inspired by macports) would be an option.
title: remove unneeded implicit packages
